Morphoscape 0.3.3
  • Reference

Coerces XY coordinate data and covariate data into a list, or optionally into a 3D array

fnc_dataframe.Rd

Coerces XY coordinate data and covariate data into a list, or optionally into a 3D array

fnc_dataframe(x, y, z, row.names, func.names = NULL, array = F, scale = T)

Arguments

x, y

A numeric vectors with x,y coordinates of observations in morphospace
z

A Numeric vector or matrix containing covariate observations corresponding to x,y coordinates. Can contain more than one covariate
func.names

An optional string containing the names for traits given in z
array

An optional logical argument to return a 3D array rather than a list. By default is set to FALSE
scale

An optional logical argument to normalize z covariates to the same unit scale. Defaults to TRUE. Can be set to FALSE if the user wishes to normalize manually

Value

Returns a list, or optionally an Array. Each sheet contains an x,y,z functional dataframe corresponding to covariates given in z, labelled by 'func.names'

Contents

  • Arguments
  • Value
